org.jhotdraw.draw.handle
Class AbstractRotateHandle

java.lang.Object
  org.jhotdraw.draw.handle.AbstractHandle
      org.jhotdraw.draw.handle.AbstractRotateHandle
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener, FigureListener, Handle
Direct Known Subclasses:
RotateHandle
public abstract class AbstractRotateHandle
extends AbstractHandle

This abstract class can be extended to implement a Handle which can rotate a Figure.

Author:
Werner Randelshofer Â @version $Id: AbstractRotateHandle.java 647 2010-01-24 22:52:59Z rawcoder $
